data.actual_result: Animation for the circle is broken and causes part of the circle to appear as a square when it reaches the other side
data.expected_result: The animation for the circle is smooth
data.short_description: Toggle animation in server settings is broken
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to "Text & Images" in your user settings - Toggle any of the choices on/off - Observe the circle as you toggle an option on/off
